main: Checks SP at turn start. At 0+ SP, gains {status:MagicalGirlAppear} triggering her positive SP mode. At negative SP, gains {status:NoVillain} triggering her negative SP mode.

In her positive SP mode, she uses plus coins and inflicts {status:Burst}. Her S3 gives her {status:ArcanaQueenOfHate} which increases all her damage, and at 3 stacks, will force her SP to be -25 or lower every turn.

In her negative SP mode, she uses minus coins and inflicts {status:Sinking} instead. All her skills will cause her to lose SP, but she can't go below -40 from her skills. Other sources of SP loss like E.G.O usage can still make her go below -45. Her S3 in this mode consumes all her {status:ArcanaQueenOfHate} and heals her back to positive SP assuming she didn't hit -45 SP before the turn ended.

Using {ego:20309} gives her an additional S3 use in her skill rotation, which is important to get her to cycle between her modes faster. It also interacts with her mechanics giving her {status:ArcanaQueenOfHate} on the Awakening and {status:HystericGauge} on the Corrosion, as well as inflicting {status:VillainMark} on the main target.
other: Has a {status:HystericGauge} that goes up by 1 per turn in negative SP mode and goes down by 1 per turn in positive SP mode. Each stack of {status:HystericGauge} buffs her negative SP skills with damage or power. Provides +1 atk weight to her negative S2 and S3 at 3 stacks. All stacks of {status:HystericGauge} are consumed when using the negative S3.
Both versions of S2 inflicts {status:VillainMark} on the main target next turn, increasing her damage to it by 10%.
Negative S3 deals bonus damage on the target if there is only one target.

Has a unique Charge called {status:ThePowerOfLoveAndHate}. Gains 1 Potency for every 10 cumulative Count consumed. Potency passively increases the damage and/or Power on all of her skills. Both versions of her S1 and S2 both consume and produce Count, and both produce more than they consume, so you can expect the Count to gradually go up even if you don't pay attention. Her positive S3 produces some Count, but both versions of her S3 consume as much Count as it can in multiples of 5.

1031201.name: Magical Girl of Love / Queen of Hatred

1031202.desc:
Gain 1 [ThePowerOfLoveAndHate] every time this unit consumes 10 cumulative [ThePowerOfLoveAndHate] Count in this Encounter

Encounter Start: if this unit does not have [HystericGauge], gain [HystericGauge]

Encounter Start: if this unit does not have [ThePowerOfLoveAndHate], gain [ThePowerOfLoveAndHate]

Turn Start:
- At 0 or higher SP, gain [MagicalGirlAppear] and lose [NoVillain]
- At less than 0 SP, gain [NoVillain] and lose [MagicalGirlAppear]

This unit's SP cannot drop below -40 due to the SP loss effects from this unit's Base Attack Skills
1031202.name: In the Name of Love and Hate - !ALERT: E.G.O GEAR SYNC THRESHOLD EXCEEDED!

1031211.desc:
Deal +2% damage for every [ThePowerOfLoveAndHate] (max 10%)
Combat Start: gain 1 [ArcanaQueenOfHate]
1031211.name: Magical Girl of Love / Queen of Hatred

1031221.desc:
If, among allies that gain [Charge] Count with their Base Attack Skills, 1 ally with the least [Charge] Count uses a Base Attack Skill that gains [Charge] Count, they gain +2 [Charge] Count (2 times per turn)
- At 0 or higher SP: heal ([Charge] on target x 2) HP (max 10; heals up to 20 per turn)
- At less than 0 SP: heal ([Charge] on target) SP (max 5; heals up to 10 per turn)
1031221.name: Magical Power Charging Support
